text:
I Knew It!

Porfiry is anxious, Raskolnikov is defiant.  
Porfiry: “I knew it!”  
Porfiry: “It’s not his own tale…”  

---

Porfiry grabs Raskolnikov’s arm, urgency in his voice.  
Porfiry: “My dear Rodion Romanovitch, you must go!”  
Raskolnikov: “You didn’t expect it either, my friend.”  

---

Raskolnikov smirks, tension lingers in the air.  
Raskolnikov: “Aren’t you going to show me?”  
Porfiry: “That’s in God’s hands.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Porfiry Petrovitch expresses surprise and anxiety during a tense interaction with Raskolnikov, hinting at underlying tensions and unresolved issues.
